entry.title: WIND WARNING , Point Lepreau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 08:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: ESE 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow mixed with rain beginning this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over Grand Manan Island late this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain mixed with snow this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over Grand Manan Island early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending in the morning then cloudy and 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning and afternoon. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
